title: Develop the main website page
description: Create a responsive layout for the homepage and implement core design elements.

title: Set up the database
description: Create table structures for users, tasks, and comments.

title: Prepare technical documentation
description: Describe the project architecture, API endpoints, and deployment requirements.

title: Implement authentication system
description: Add user registration, login, and logout using JWT tokens.

title: Develop admin dashboard
description: Add CRUD functionality for managing users and content.

title: Optimize website performance
description: Reduce page load time to under 2 seconds, optimize images, and improve caching.

title: Add comment system
description: Implement comment functionality under posts with moderation tools.

title: Conduct usability testing
description: Organize interface testing with real users and gather feedback.

title: Set up CI/CD pipeline
description: Integrate automatic deployment using GitHub Actions or GitLab CI.

title: Write backend unit tests
description: Test core API logic using Jest or Mocha.
